name: Teriyaki Chicken
description: Super quick and easy teriyaki chicken recipe that is packed with salty goodness. Perfect for a quick and delicious dinner.
keywords: Teriyaki Chicken, Asian, Japanese, Chicken, Dinner, Easy, Quick, Soy Sauce, Brown Sugar, Sake, Mirin, Sesame Oil, Garlic, Ginger, Broccoli, Rice, Spring Onion, Sesame Seeds, Glaze, Salty, Sweet, Chicken Dish, Poultry, One-pan, Family Friendly, Kid Friendly, Lunch, Healthy, Weeknight Dinner

recipeInstructions.text: In a small jug or bowl, combine the sauce ingredients. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Prep sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Start cooking rice according to the package instructions.
recipeInstructions.name: Prep rice

recipeInstructions.text: Heat cooking oil in a large pan over high heat. Stir fry the chicken, stirring occasionally, until lightly browned.
recipeInstructions.name: Brown chicken

recipeInstructions.text: Pour in the sauce and allow it to cook down while stirring to ensure it doesn't stick. Cook until the sauce thickens into a beautiful shiny glaze.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook chicken in sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the teriyaki chicken with rice, steamed broccoli, spring onion slices, and sesame seeds.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve

notes: I'm addicted to chili, personally think it goes well with a pinch of finely sliced red chilis.
Th recipe is not super sausy, really glazes the chicken. If you want more sauce, increase sauce ingredients except for the brown sugar and don't cook it all the way down to a glaze.
